=================================================================================
Plot:
=================================================================================

Everly (Salma Hayek), a prostitute working for the brutal criminal overlord Taiko (Hiroyuki Watanabe), is being attacked in her apartment by Taiko's enforcers after he discovers that she has been working with the police to bring down his organization. An action/thriller centered on Everly, who faces down assassins sent by her ex, Taiko, a mob boss, while holed up in her apartment.
